section.name: Servlet Engines
section.p: This section of the tutorial covers the different Servlet Engines that can be used.

In the tutorial we have been using Jetty from Apache which is easy to set up. You may want to use another servlet Engine or need to follow a corporate standard. Jetspeed can accomodate a wide range of servlet engines including:

section.name: Tomcat
section.p: This section of the tutorial discusses how to change the portal that was created in the tutorial so that it uses the Tomcat Servlet Engine.
